caption.p: Wellness scale. Interpretation of the 0-to-5 observational scale of patient wellness at the Sierra Leonean ETUs.

tr.td: Well: no symptoms: drinks and eats okay
Few symptoms: drinks and eats okay
Moderate symptoms: can walk, sit, and feed independently
Sick: needs help to be fed, drink, and take medications
Very sick: needs IV fluids and medications, lots of assistance
